title: Spicy Garlic Shrimp
description: A quick and flavorful seafood dish perfect for weeknights.
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined

instructions.step: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes; saut√© for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until pink and opaque.
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.
